payload.title: ChangelogRecord Complete - Factory + Validator + Tests
payload.description: Implement complete ChangelogRecord with factory (createChangelogRecord), validator (validateChangelogRecordDetailed, isChangelogRecord, validateFullChangelogRecord) and comprehensive EARS tests. Includes auto-generated types and crypto module integration.
payload.notes: ChangelogRecord implemented as final auditable result of completed tasks. Factory with ID generation from taskId slug preservation, validator with schema + checksum + signatures, 8 EARS tests covering all cases. Communication layer for value delivery.
